detaileddescription.para: SW Unit testing is accomplished through SWATT. The test case are based on this design, and shall also cover the configuration options.

sect1.title: Verification by Review
sect1.para: The review is available in git. Any points linked to JIRA tickets.

sect1.title: Verification by Testing
sect1.para: The functions of "UDSServiceHandler Integration" are tested automatically by a SWATT test. See links at the related functions under "Test Method".
